document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has called hollywood star george clooney among his defense witnesses when he goes on trial next month accused of sleeping with an under-aged prostitute, court documents said.
document.title: george clooney called as witness in berlusconi sex trial
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi has called hollywood star george clooney among his defense witnesses when he goes on trial next month accused of sleeping with an under-aged prostitute, court documents said.
